Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:89.6% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Rabbit erythrocytes:4.7% Hemolysis=83 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=25µg/ml),Campylobacter jejuni NCTC 11168(MIC=0.78-1.56µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=100µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 15313(MIC=25µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MIC=50µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ACM 11(MIC=25µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae IMP 170(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Pseudomonas oleovorans(MIC=50µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=0.43µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=2.33µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=0.43µg/ml),Clostridioides difficile(MIC=12.7µg/ml),Escherichia coli NCTC 12241(MIC=0.39µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=25µg/ml)
